alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 17 at 2:47AM EST until January 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches mainly along and south of Route 3, with localized up to 15 inches possible near Star Lake. * WHERE...Southeastern St. Lawrence County. * WHEN...From 7 AM Wednesday to 1 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult with rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities within the lake effect snow band. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A lake band is expected to enter the area this morning, and then gradually shift south of the area on Thursday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
